text:
ACT SAT Prep How to determine the price increase and decrease of a value

Joanna purchases [imath] \$ 250 [/imath] worht of stock. The prices of stock goes up [imath] 20 \% [/imath] in the next week. Then falls by [imath] 20 \% [/imath] on the following week. If Joanna decides to sell the stock,\n4\nthen what will be the net earning or loss for the transaction?
